addBlocklist.description: Add email addresses, domains, and keywords to the blocklist.

props.name: emails
props.description: Enter the email addresses to block (e.g., ["abc@gmail.com"])

props.name: domains
props.description: Enter the domains to block (e.g., ["example.com"])

props.name: keywords
props.description: Enter keywords to block (e.g., ["spam", "blacklist"])

addEmail.description: Add an email to a specific account.

props.description: Choose a campaign from the list or enter the campaign ID manually.

props.name: email
props.description: Enter the email address to add to the campaign.

props.name: firstName

props.name: lastName
props.description: Enter the last name for the lead

props.name: customVariables

props.name: accountId
